column1: #Text=Gyatso says : " But the true secret , is in the gooey center . "
#Text=Aang says : " Hmm ... " Gyatso says : " My ancient cake - making technique is n't the only thing on your mind , is it , Aang ? "
#Text=Aang says : " This whole Avatar thing , m - maybe the monks made a mistake . "
#Text=Gyatso says : " The only mistake they made was telling you before you turned sixteen , but we ca n't concern ourselves with what was .
